title: WAPCOS Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 General Manager Posts
description: The Water and Power Consultancy Services (WAPCOS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 General Manager Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBA or any degree can apply for the WAPCOS Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appl...
